plot outline: This is a story about Deba, an antisocial and Minu, who lived alone after murdering her drunken husband. Minu has developed a relation with Khayra, also an antisocial and opponent of Deba. One day police raid Deba's area. He escapes and by mistake hides into Minu's room, which is in Khayra's area. Minu helps him to hide in her room for ten day.
title: Dus Din Pore
